renderpass.code:
#define\
                              G g=abs\
                              (p)-vec2\
                              (w-=.16\
                              ,.05);d\
                              =min(d,\
                              length(\
                              max(g,0.\
                              )));p.y\
                              +=.2;///                     
        void mainImage(out vec4 O,vec2 U){vec2 R=iResolution
        .xy,p=(U+U-R)/R.y,g;vec3 c=mix(vec3(.8,.08,.5),vec3(
        1,.7,.12),p.y+.6*fract(sin(dot(p,vec2(11,31)))*4e4))
         

                 ;float w=.65,d=.75-length(p);p+=cos                 
                 (p.yx*75.)*.01;g=abs(p-vec2(0,.25))
                 -vec2(.05,.25);d=min(d,length(max(g,
                 
                 
                         0.)));G G G;O.rgb        
                         =sqrt(smoothstep(                
                         0.,4./R.y,d)*c);}
renderpass.name: Image
